SRP.A: The peak of  Urban Redevelopment Areas is to the {left} of the peak of Luxury Residences.

VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Luxury Residences shows a {Periodic fluctuation}.

EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Urban Redevelopment Areas} has the highest peak.

EVJ.A: At X =538324.1,the label with the highest density is {Urban Redevelopment Areas}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 567648? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Luxury Residences}'s peak at {811812},{Urban Redevelopment Areas}'s peak at {649650}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 692378? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Metropolitan Areas}'s peak at {203203},{Urban Redevelopment Areas}'s peak at {649650}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Metropolitan Areas or Urban Redevelopment Areas?
NC.A: {Urban Redevelopment Areas} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Luxury Residences or Urban Redevelopment Areas?
NC.A: {Luxury Residences} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Luxury Residences or Metropolitan Areas?
NC.A: {Luxury Residences} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {2} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Urban Redevelopment Areas}
